taskman.backend.project

Class ProjectOrganizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • taskman.backend.project.ProjectOrganizer

  • public class ProjectOrganizer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for creating, storing and retrieving projects of the system.

      ProjectOrganizer()
      Construct an empty ProjectOrganizer.

      • getProjects

        public java.util.List<Project> getProjects(User user)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a list of projects.

      • getProject

        public Project getProject(java.lang.String name)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns the project with the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the project as String.
        Returns:
        a project.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if no project is found with the given name.

      • createProject

        public void createProject(java.lang.String name,
                          java.lang.String description,
                          java.time.LocalDateTime creationTime,
                          java.time.LocalDateTime dueTime,
                          User user)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Add a project with the properties.
        Parameters:
        name - the project name
        description - the project description
        creationTime - the creation time of the project. The creation time must be of the following format: dd/mm/yyyy hh:mm.
        dueTime - the due time of the project. The due time must be of the following format: dd/mm/yyyy hh:mm
        user - the current user.
        Postcondition:
        a project with the given properties will be added to the ProjectOrganizer.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when one of the given parameters is not of a valid format.
